aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.model

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.model.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the data model for an event course. Allows the setting and retrieval of data about a particular course.
